function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of need-based initiatives and geopolitical cooperation","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and disease spread, leading to higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Enhance international collaboration and information sharing, prioritize need-based initiatives, and strengthen healthcare systems","Technologies":"Digital health platforms for information sharing, AI for predictive modeling of disease spread","People":"Global population, particularly vulnerable groups","Owner":"International health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on informal sector workers and migrant workers","Impact":"High risk of poverty, limited income and livelihood options","Mitigation":"Provide financial support, access to healthcare, and social protection measures","Technologies":"Financial assistance platforms, telemedicine for healthcare access","People":"Informal sector workers, migrant workers","Owner":"Governments, NGOs"},{"Description":"Increased incidence of suicide among vulnerable populations","Impact":"Higher incidence of suicide due to loss of income, livelihood, and other factors","Mitigation":"Mental health support, financial assistance, and community outreach programs","Technologies":"Telepsychiatry for mental health support, community outreach platforms","People":"Vulnerable populations","Owner":"Mental health organizations, governments"}]}
